resources.string: The innocent bird needs your help to reach 500 points in order to escape from enemies and reach its nest. Can you help the bird in this task?

" "1. Press and hold on the screen to move the bird upwards."
" "
" 2. To move the bird downward, remove touch from the screen."
""
" 3. Each coin has a value of 10 points."
""
" 4. Collision with enemy birds costs you 1 heart"
""
" 5. After 3 hearts, your game will be over."
""
" 6. To win the game, you have to score 500 points."
""
" 7. Press ""PLAY"" to continue.
